ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <>"2008-09 Operations Administration",ISCHANGED(Ready_to_Audit__c ), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Ready_to_Audit__c ))), true, IF(NOT(Ready_to_Audit__c = TODAY()), true, false) ))
